title: Review Us & Get Rewarded!
description: For every review you write for us, we'll give you some free credits once your review is published.
credit_node_text_1: Write a detailed review of Writesonic on G2. Please send us a screenshot once it is posted to support@writesonic.com and we'll add the credits to your account.
credit_node_text_2: Write a detailed review of Writesonic on Capterra. Please send us a screenshot once it is posted to support@writesonic.com and we'll add the credits to your account.
credit_node_text_3: Write a detailed review of Writesonic on Trustpilot. Please send us a screenshot once it is posted to support@writesonic.com and we'll add the credits to your account.
